borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:20px; margin-right:20px; margin-top:0px"><span style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The proposed flat roof design at first floor level&nbsp;is considered discordant and incongruous with the host property and character of the Ivyhouse&nbsp; Road and the Becontree Estate.&nbsp;There is no precedent for a flat roof extension at first floor level along this terrace. Therefore,&nbsp;the scale, siting and design of the first floor extension is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</span></span></span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies SP2,&nbsp; DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version,&nbsp;October 2020).</span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The scale, siting and design of the proposed first floor extension&nbsp;would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring property No 145 Ivyhouse Road,. Furthermore, first floor rear extension are not a common form of development on Felton Road and the Surrounding area. Therefore, the proposal constitutes as&nbsp;unneighbourly development and contrary to: </span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016); </span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</span></p><p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">-Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version,&nbsp;October 2020).</span></p>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension.
